content: उपज्ञा {c9c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To ascertain; to know. {@--2@} To invent, find out, hit upon: (उपज्ञातं = विनोपदेशेन ज्ञातं); see उपज्ञा below.

उपज्ञा [उपज्ञायते इत्युपज्ञा कर्मण्यङ्] {@--1@} Knowledge acquired by oneself and not handed down by tradition, invention, primitive or untaught knowledge; usually in <ab>comp.</ab> which is treated as a neuter noun ( <ls>P. II. 4. 21</ls>); पाणिनेरुपज्ञा पाणिन्युपज्ञं ग्रंथः <ls>Sk.</ls>; प्राचेतसोपज्ञं रामायणं <ls>R. 15. 63.</ls> {@--2@} Undertaking or commencing a thing not done before; लोकेऽ भूद्यदुपज्ञमेव विदुषां सौजन्यजन्यं यशः <ls>Malli.</ls> on Raghuvaṃśa.
